description: Variation of condition 2 of approved permission 1247/22, as varied by application 1373/23: Condition to be varied to supersede the approved plans with the amended plans. Additional 1 proposed conservation roof light. Section 73 consent sought under planning application reference: 2871/24 (summary)
decision_conditions:
The works to which this consent relate shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and to ensure that the Local Planning Authority retains the right to review unimplemented consents and to ensure their long-term future in accordance with Policy LP33 in the Councilâ€™s Local Plan.
reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_: Full Planning application ref 1247/22 :Alterations to roof space to create two self-contained flats (one x 1-bedroom, one x 2-bedroom), with associated amenity space, car parking, cycle and refuse storage.  (summary) Listed Building Consent sought under application ref 1249/22.
